credit_line: Williams College Museum of Art, Prendergast Archive and Study Center, Gift of Mrs. Charles Prendergast
title: Newspaper clipping from The New York Times, including article entitled "Illuminating a Period"
description: Found in A.1.212, Whitney Museum of American Art: William Glackens Memorial Exhibition. Article "Illuminating a Period" mentions William Glackens and the sixtieth anniversary of "The Eight" showing their work in 1908.
